name: Not so Impossible Game
description:
This game is my adaption of the Impossible Game. I made it for a 24 hour game dev challenge on YouTube. Check out the video if your interested.  It's quite difficult to complete, see if you can make it. 

I may continue working on this to fix some of the bugs and make the second and third levels longer but they are just concepts at this point since I ran out of time. Also if there is any interest I'll upload it to the Google Play Store.

Controls:                Space - Jump
